meta.title: Big Five Personality Test
meta.description: 100 statements that describe you. Indicate how accurately each describes you.

items.text: I'm usually the life of the party.
I usually don't talk a lot.
I feel comfortable around people.
I usually keep in the background at social settings.
I often start conversations.
I generally have little to say.
I love talking to a lot of different people at parties.
I don't like to draw attention to myself.
I don't mind being the center of attention.
I'm usually quiet around strangers.
I make friends easily.
I find it difficult to approach others.
I like to take charge.
I'll usually wait for others to lead the way.
I know how to captivate people.
I have a strong personality.
I often talk others into doing things.
I generally don't assert myself.
I like to take initiative.
I lack self-confidence.
I have a soft heart.
I'm not really interested in others.
I will often take time out for others.
I often insult people.
I feel others’ emotions.
I'm not interested in other people’s problems.
I like to make people feel at ease.
I look down on others.
I sympathize with others’ feelings.
I’m indifferent to the feelings of others.
I value cooperation over competition.
I'm hard to get to know.
I'm sensitive to others’ needs.
I hold grudges.
I trust others.
I don’t really feel sympathy for others.
I love to help others.
I often distrust people.
I usually show concern for others.
I generally think of others as rivals.
I am always prepared.
I leave my belongings around.
I often pay attention to details.
I make a mess of things.
I love to get chores done right away.
I often forget to put things back in their proper place.
I like order.
I often shirk my duties.
I love following a schedule.
I often waste my time.
I am exacting in my work.
I will often neglect my responsibilities.
I love doing things according to a plan.
I find it difficult to get down to work.
I always persist until the task is finished.
I usually need a push to get started.
I always carry out my plans.
I often have difficulty starting tasks.
When I make plans, I stick to them.
I often mess things up.
I get stressed out easily.
I'm relaxed most of the time.
I often worry about things.
I rarely feel blue.
I'm easily disturbed by things.
I get upset easily.
I have frequent mood swings.
I'm not easily bothered by things.
I change my mood a lot.
I will rarely get irritated.
I'm easily hurt.
I rarely get nervous.
I get irritated easily.
I usually remain calm under pressure.
I feel blue.
I am not easily frustrated.
I panic easily.
I am not easily angered.
I often get overwhelmed by emotions.
I rarely feel depressed or sad.
I have a vivid imagination.
I don't like philosophical discussions.
I have excellent ideas.
I'm never interested in abstract ideas.
I'm usually quick to understand things.
I don't really like art.
I often use difficult words.
I have difficulty understanding abstract ideas.
I often spend time reflecting on things.
I'm not really interested in artistic experiences.
I'm someone who's full of ideas.
I avoid difficult reading material.
I often carry the conversation to a higher level.
I don't really enjoy going to art museums.
I always enjoy hearing new ideas.
I'm not interested in theoretical discussions.
I like to solve complex problems.
I'm not a fan of poetry.
I think pretty quickly.
I avoid difficult problems.
